title: About
subtitle: Connecting youth to Christ through spiritual growth, community, and meaningful experiences.
whoDesc: Welcome to the Youth Ministry of Virgin Mary & St. George Church in Gabriel, Alexandria! We serve undergraduates and graduates, creating a loving family where young people grow in faith, build friendships, and serve the community.
visionDesc: We believe in empowering young people to live a Christ-centered life by providing spiritual guidance, engaging activities, and a supportive Christian community. Our goal is to inspire and equip youth to grow in their relationship with God and positively impact the world around them.
